title: EUW black screen on opening new clinet (old client retired)
body: Since the old client became unavailable I haven't been able to play LOL as the screen goes black on launching. I've always had good connecting, quick download speed and usually no trouble at all. I've tried the editing the windows mode (from 0-1) in the config folder and the leagueclientoptin option (from yes to no) in the user folder. Any other suggestions at all?

replies.body:
Most of the time a black screen like that means that the client is having a really hard time getting a solid signal from our servers, so basically it can't figure out what to display so it just defaults to nothing but black. 

We may just need to adjust a few network settings, so try going through the steps in our [**connection guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues). Definitely hit me back if that doesn't help and we'll dig a little deeper!
